content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Ms. Wang. As we focus solely on the negotiation of the rental price during this conversation, let me start by stating a high initial amount for your consideration. The monthly rent for this exquisite apartment in a prime city center location is 1500 Euros. Now, please share your proposed price to initiate our negotiation process. 

Remember, if you want to accept the rental price proposed by me later in the conversation, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you don't want to continue negotiating, provide a reason using 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If an agreement on a price is reached or no agreement is found after the negotiation, the conversation will terminate with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
